abilities.name: Toxic Boost
abilities.desc: While this Pokemon is poisoned, the power of its physical attacks is multiplied by 1.5.
abilities.shortDesc: While this Pokemon is poisoned, its physical attacks have 1.5x power.

abilities.name: Toxic Chain
abilities.desc: This Pokemon's attacks have a 30% chance of badly poisoning. This effect comes before a move's inherent secondary effect chance.
abilities.shortDesc: This Pokemon's attacks have a 30% chance of badly poisoning.

abilities.name: Toxic Debris
abilities.shortDesc: If this Pokemon is hit by a physical attack, Toxic Spikes are set on the opposing side.

abilities.name: Trace
abilities.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon copies a random opposing Pokemon's Ability. Abilities that cannot be copied are As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Embody Aspect, Flower Gift, Forecast, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Poison Puppeteer, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Teraform Zero, Tera Shell, Tera Shift, Trace, Zen Mode, and Zero to Hero. If no opposing Pokemon has an Ability that can be copied, this Ability will activate as soon as one does.
abilities.shortDesc: On switch-in, or when it can, this Pokemon copies a random adjacent foe's Ability.

abilities.name: Transistor
abilities.shortDesc: This Pokemon's offensive stat is multiplied by 1.3 while using an Electric-type attack.

abilities.name: Triage
abilities.shortDesc: This Pokemon's healing moves have their priority increased by 3.

abilities.name: Truant
abilities.shortDesc: This Pokemon skips every other turn instead of using a move.

abilities.name: Turboblaze
abilities.desc: This Pokemon's moves and their effects ignore certain Abilities of other Pokemon. The Abilities that can be negated are Armor Tail, Aroma Veil, Aura Break, Battle Armor, Big Pecks, Bulletproof, Clear Body, Contrary, Damp, Dazzling, Disguise, Dry Skin, Earth Eater, Filter, Flash Fire, Flower Gift, Flower Veil, Fluffy, Friend Guard, Fur Coat, Good as Gold, Grass Pelt, Guard Dog, Heatproof, Heavy Metal, Hyper Cutter, Ice Face, Ice Scales, Illuminate, Immunity, Inner Focus, Insomnia, Keen Eye, Leaf Guard, Levitate, Light Metal, Lightning Rod, Limber, Magic Bounce, Magma Armor, Marvel Scale, Mind's Eye, Mirror Armor, Motor Drive, Multiscale, Oblivious, Overcoat, Own Tempo, Pastel Veil, Punk Rock, Purifying Salt, Queenly Majesty, Sand Veil, Sap Sipper, Shell Armor, Shield Dust, Simple, Snow Cloak, Solid Rock, Soundproof, Sticky Hold, Storm Drain, Sturdy, Suction Cups, Sweet Veil, Tangled Feet, Telepathy, Tera Shell, Thermal Exchange, Thick Fat, Unaware, Vital Spirit, Volt Absorb, Water Absorb, Water Bubble, Water Veil, Well-Baked Body, White Smoke, Wind Rider, Wonder Guard, and Wonder Skin. This affects every other Pokemon on the field, whether or not it is a target of this Pokemon's move, and whether or not their Ability is beneficial to this Pokemon.
abilities.shortDesc: This Pokemon's moves and their effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

abilities.name: Unaware
abilities.desc: This Pokemon ignores other Pokemon's Attack, Special Attack, and accuracy stat stages when taking damage, and ignores other Pokemon's Defense, Special Defense, and evasiveness stat stages when dealing damage.
abilities.shortDesc: This Pokemon ignores other Pokemon's stat stages when taking or doing damage.

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.desc: If this Pokemon loses its held item for any reason, its Speed is doubled as long as it remains active, has this Ability, and is not holding an item.
abilities.shortDesc: Speed is doubled on held item loss; boost is lost if it switches, gets new item/Ability.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.desc: While this Pokemon is active, it prevents opposing Pokemon from using their Berries. This Ability activates before hazards and other Abilities take effect.
abilities.shortDesc: While this Pokemon is active, it prevents opposing Pokemon from using their Berries.

abilities.name: Unseen Fist
abilities.shortDesc: This Pokemon's contact moves ignore the target's protection, except Max Guard.

abilities.name: Vessel of Ruin
abilities.shortDesc: Active Pokemon without this Ability have their Special Attack multiplied by 0.75.

abilities.name: Victory Star
abilities.shortDesc: This Pokemon and its allies' moves have their accuracy multiplied by 1.1.

abilities.name: Vital Spirit
abilities.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.

abilities.name: Volt Absorb
abilities.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Electric-type moves and restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when hit by an Electric-type move.
abilities.shortDesc: This Pokemon heals 1/4 of its max HP when hit by Electric moves; Electric immunity.

abilities.name: Wandering Spirit
abilities.desc: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Ability swapped with this one. Does not affect Pokemon with the Abilities As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Embody Aspect, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Poison Puppeteer, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shell, Tera Shift, Teraform Zero, Wonder Guard, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
abilities.shortDesc: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Ability swapped with this one.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Water-type moves and restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when hit by a Water-type move.
abilities.shortDesc: This Pokemon heals 1/4 of its max HP when hit by Water moves; Water immunity.

abilities.name: Water Bubble
abilities.desc: This Pokemon's offensive stat is doubled while using a Water-type attack. If a Pokemon uses a Fire-type attack against this Pokemon, that Pokemon's offensive stat is halved when calculating the damage to this Pokemon. This Pokemon cannot be burned. Gaining this Ability while burned cures it.
abilities.shortDesc: This Pokemon's Water power is 2x; it can't be burned; Fire power against it is halved.

abilities.name: Water Compaction
abilities.shortDesc: This Pokemon's Defense is raised 2 stages after it is damaged by a Water-type move.

abilities.name: Water Veil
abilities.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot be burned. Gaining this Ability while burned cures it.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.desc: If a physical attack hits this Pokemon, its Defense is lowered by 1 stage and its Speed is raised by 2 stages.
abilities.shortDesc: If a physical attack hits this Pokemon, Defense is lowered by 1, Speed is raised by 2.

abilities.name: Well-Baked Body
abilities.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Fire-type moves and raises its Defense by 2 stages when hit by a Fire-type move.
abilities.shortDesc: This Pokemon's Defense is raised 2 stages if hit by a Fire move; Fire immunity.

abilities.name: White Smoke
abilities.shortDesc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.

abilities.name: Wimp Out
abilities.desc: When this Pokemon has more than 1/2 its maximum HP and takes damage bringing it to 1/2 or less of its maximum HP, it immediately switches out to a chosen ally. This effect applies after all hits from a multi-hit move. This effect is prevented if the move had a secondary effect removed by the Sheer Force Ability. This effect applies to both direct and indirect damage, except Curse and Substitute on use, Belly Drum, Pain Split, and confusion damage.
abilities.shortDesc: This Pokemon switches out when it reaches 1/2 or less of its maximum HP.

abilities.name: Wind Power
abilities.desc: This Pokemon gains the Charge effect when it takes a hit from a wind move or when Tailwind begins on this Pokemon's side.
abilities.shortDesc: This Pokemon gains the Charge effect when hit by a wind move or Tailwind begins.

abilities.name: Wind Rider
abilities.desc: This Pokemon is immune to wind moves and raises its Attack by 1 stage when hit by a wind move or when Tailwind begins on this Pokemon's side.
abilities.shortDesc: Attack raised by 1 if hit by a wind move or Tailwind begins. Wind move immunity.

abilities.name: Wonder Guard
abilities.shortDesc: This Pokemon can only be damaged by supereffective moves and indirect damage.

abilities.name: Wonder Skin
abilities.desc: Non-damaging moves that check accuracy have their accuracy changed to 50% when used against this Pokemon. This effect comes before other effects that modify accuracy.
abilities.shortDesc: Status moves with accuracy checks are 50% accurate when used on this Pokemon.

abilities.name: Zen Mode
abilities.desc: If this Pokemon is a Darmanitan or Galarian Darmanitan, it changes to Zen Mode if it has 1/2 or less of its maximum HP at the end of a turn. If Darmanitan's HP is above 1/2 of its maximum HP at the end of a turn, it changes back to Standard Mode.
abilities.shortDesc: If Darmanitan, at end of turn changes Mode to Standard if > 1/2 max HP, else Zen.

abilities.name: Zero to Hero
abilities.shortDesc: If this Pokemon is a Palafin in Zero Form, switching out has it change to Hero Form.

abilities.name: Mountaineer
abilities.shortDesc: On switch-in, this Pokemon avoids all Rock-type attacks and Stealth Rock.

abilities.name: Rebound
abilities.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon blocks certain status moves and instead uses the move against the original user.
abilities.shortDesc: On switch-in, blocks certain status moves and bounces them back to the user.

abilities.name: Persistent
abilities.desc: The duration of Gravity, Heal Block, Magic Room, Safeguard, Tailwind, Trick Room, and Wonder Room is increased by 2 turns if the effect is started by this Pokemon.
abilities.shortDesc: When used, Gravity/Heal Block/Safeguard/Tailwind/Room effects last 2 more turns.

moves.name: 10,000,000 Volt Thunderbolt
moves.desc: Has a very high chance for a critical hit.
moves.shortDesc: Very high critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Absorb
moves.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
moves.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

moves.name: Accelerock
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: Usually goes first.

moves.name: Acid
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the foe(s) Sp. Def by 1.

moves.name: Acid Armor
moves.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Defense by 2.

moves.name: Acid Downpour
moves.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

moves.name: Acid Spray
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 2.

moves.name: Acrobatics
moves.shortDesc: Power doubles if the user has no held item.

moves.name: Acupressure
moves.desc: Raises a random stat by 2 stages as long as the stat is not already at stage 6. The user can choose to use this move on itself or an adjacent ally. Fails if no stat stage can be raised or if used on an ally with a substitute.
moves.shortDesc: Raises a random stat of the user or an ally by 2.

moves.name: Aerial Ace
moves.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

moves.name: Aeroblast
moves.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
moves.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: After You
moves.desc: The target makes its move immediately after the user this turn, no matter the priority of its selected move. Fails if the target would have moved next anyway, or if the target already moved this turn.
moves.shortDesc: The target makes its move right after the user.

moves.name: Agility

moves.name: Coil
moves.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises user's Attack, Defense, accuracy by 1.

moves.name: Collision Course
moves.desc: Damage is multiplied by 1.3333 if this move is super effective against the target.
moves.shortDesc: Deals 1.3333x damage with supereffective hits.

moves.name: Combat Torque
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to paralyze the target.

moves.name: Comet Punch
moves.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.
moves.shortDesc: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

moves.name: Comeuppance
moves.desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical or special attack this turn equal to 1.5 times the HP lost by the user from that attack, rounded down. If the user did not lose HP from that attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical or special attack this turn.
moves.shortDesc: If hit by an attack, returns 1.5x damage.

moves.name: Confide
moves.desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

moves.name: Confuse Ray
moves.desc: Causes the target to become confused.
moves.shortDesc: Confuses the target.

moves.name: Confusion
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to confuse the target.

moves.name: Constrict
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

moves.name: Continental Crush
moves.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

moves.name: Conversion
moves.desc: The user's type changes to match the original type of the move in its first move slot. Fails if the user cannot change its type, or if the type is one of the user's current types.
moves.shortDesc: Changes user's type to match its first move.

moves.name: Conversion 2
moves.desc: The user's type changes to match a type that resists or is immune to the type of the last move used by the target, but not either of its current types. The determined type of the move is used rather than the original type. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user cannot change its type, or if this move would only be able to select one of the user's current types.
moves.shortDesc: Changes user's type to resist target's last move.

moves.name: Copycat
moves.desc: The user uses the last move used by any Pokemon, including itself. Fails if no move has been used, or if the last move used was Assist, Baneful Bunker, Beak Blast, Behemoth Bash, Behemoth Blade, Belch, Bestow, Blazing Torque, Celebrate, Chatter, Circle Throw, Combat Torque, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Dragon Tail, Dynamax Cannon, Endure, Feint, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, King's Shield, Magical Torque, Mat Block, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Protect, Rage Powder, Roar, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Spiky Shield, Spotlight, Struggle, Switcheroo, Tera Starstorm, Thief, Transform, Trick, Whirlwind, or Wicked Torque.
moves.shortDesc: Uses the last move used in the battle.

moves.name: Core Enforcer
moves.desc: If the user moves after the target, the target's Ability is rendered ineffective as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain under this effect. If the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Ice Face, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shift, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero, this effect does not happen, and receiving the effect through Baton Pass ends the effect immediately.
moves.shortDesc: Nullifies the foe(s) Ability if the foe(s) move first.

moves.name: Corkscrew Crash
moves.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

moves.name: Corrosive Gas
moves.desc: The target loses its held item. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item or cause a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, a Silvally, a Zacian, or a Zamazenta to lose their Blue Orb, Red Orb, Griseous Orb, Plate, Drive, Memory, Rusted Sword, or Rusted Shield respectively. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
moves.shortDesc: Removes adjacent Pokemon's held items.

moves.name: Cosmic Power
moves.desc: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

moves.name: Cotton Guard
moves.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 3 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Defense by 3.

moves.name: Cotton Spore
moves.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2.

moves.name: Counter
moves.desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical attack this turn.
moves.shortDesc: If hit by physical attack, returns double damage.

moves.name: Court Change
moves.desc: Switches the Mist, Light Screen, Reflect, Spikes, Safeguard, Tailwind, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, Water Pledge, Fire Pledge, Grass Pledge, Sticky Web, Aurora Veil, G-Max Steelsurge, G-Max Cannonade, G-Max Vine Lash, and G-Max Wildfire effects from the user's side to the opposing side and vice versa.
moves.shortDesc: Swaps user's field effects with the opposing side.

moves.name: Covet
moves.desc: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail or Z-Crystal, or if the target is a Kyogre holding a Blue Orb, a Groudon holding a Red Orb, a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, a Genesect holding a Drive, a Silvally holding a Memory, or a Pokemon that can Mega Evolve holding the Mega Stone for its species. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
moves.shortDesc: If the user has no item, it steals the target's.

moves.name: Crabhammer
moves.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
moves.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Crafty Shield
moves.desc: The user and its party members are protected from non-damaging attacks made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
moves.shortDesc: Protects allies from Status moves this turn.

moves.name: Cross Chop
moves.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
moves.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Cross Poison
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.
moves.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. 10% chance to poison.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

moves.name: Crush Claw
moves.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

moves.name: Crush Grip
moves.desc: Power is equal to 120 * (target's current HP / target's maximum HP), rounded half down, but not less than 1.
moves.shortDesc: More power the more HP the target has left.

moves.name: Curse
moves.desc: If the user is not a Ghost type, lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage and raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage. If the user is a Ghost type, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down and even if it would cause fainting, in exchange for the target losing 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn while it is active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue to be affected. Fails if there is no target or if the target is already affected.
moves.shortDesc: Curses if Ghost, else -1 Spe, +1 Atk, +1 Def.

moves.name: Cut
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Darkest Lariat
moves.desc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness.
moves.shortDesc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes.

moves.name: Dark Pulse
moves.desc: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
moves.shortDesc: 20% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Dark Void
moves.desc: Causes the target to fall asleep. This move cannot be used successfully unless the user's current form, while considering Transform, is Darkrai.
moves.shortDesc: Darkrai: Causes the foe(s) to fall asleep.

moves.name: Dazzling Gleam
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

moves.name: Decorate
moves.desc: Raises the target's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the target's Attack and Sp. Atk by 2.

moves.name: Defend Order
moves.desc: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

moves.name: Defense Curl
moves.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage. As long as the user remains active, the power of the user's Ice Ball and Rollout will be doubled (this effect is not stackable).
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Defense by 1.

moves.name: Defog
moves.desc: Lowers the target's evasiveness by 1 stage. If this move is successful and whether or not the target's evasiveness was affected, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, Aurora Veil, Safeguard, Mist, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the target's side, and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the user's side. Ignores a target's substitute, although a substitute will still block the lowering of evasiveness. If there is a terrain active and this move is successful, the terrain will be cleared.
moves.shortDesc: -1 evasion; ends user and target hazards/terrain.

moves.name: Destiny Bond
moves.desc: Until the user's next move, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that Pokemon faints as well, unless the attack was Doom Desire or Future Sight. Fails if the user used this move successfully as its last move, disregarding moves used through the Dancer Ability.
moves.shortDesc: If an opponent knocks out the user, it also faints.

moves.name: Detect
moves.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
moves.shortDesc: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.

moves.name: Devastating Drake
moves.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

moves.name: Diamond Storm
moves.desc: Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Defense by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: 50% chance to raise user's Defense by 2.

moves.name: Dig
moves.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Earthquake and Magnitude but takes double damage from them, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
moves.shortDesc: Digs underground turn 1, strikes turn 2.

moves.name: Dire Claw
moves.desc: Has a 50% chance to cause the target to either fall asleep, become poisoned, or become paralyzed.
moves.shortDesc: 50% chance to sleep, poison, or paralyze target.

moves.name: Disable
moves.desc: For 4 turns, the target's last move used becomes disabled. Fails if one of the target's moves is already disabled, if the target has not made a move, if the target no longer knows the move, or if the move was a Max or G-Max Move.
moves.shortDesc: For 4 turns, disables the target's last move used.

moves.name: Disarming Voice
moves.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
moves.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy. Hits foes.

moves.name: Discharge
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to paralyze adjacent Pokemon.

moves.name: Dive
moves.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Surf and Whirlpool but takes double damage from them, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
moves.shortDesc: Dives underwater turn 1, strikes turn 2.

moves.name: Dizzy Punch
moves.desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
moves.shortDesc: 20% chance to confuse the target.

moves.name: Doodle
moves.desc: The user and its ally's Abilities change to match the target's Ability. Does not change Ability if the user's or its ally's is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Ice Face, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shift, Zen Mode, Zero to Hero, or already matches the target. Fails if both the user and its ally's Ability already matches the target, or if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Embody Aspect, Flower Gift, Forecast, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Poison Puppeteer, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shell, Tera Shift, Teraform Zero, Trace, Wonder Guard, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
moves.shortDesc: User and ally's Abilities become target's Ability.

moves.name: Doom Desire
moves.desc: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Future Sight is already in effect for the target's position.
moves.shortDesc: Hits two turns after being used.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
moves.shortDesc: Has 33% recoil.

moves.name: Double Hit
moves.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.
moves.shortDesc: Hits 2 times in one turn.

moves.name: Double Iron Bash
moves.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
moves.shortDesc: Hits twice. 30% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Double Kick
moves.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.
moves.shortDesc: Hits 2 times in one turn.

moves.name: Double Shock
moves.desc: Fails unless the user is an Electric type. If this move is successful and the user is not Terastallized, the user's Electric type becomes typeless as long as it remains active.
moves.shortDesc: User's Electric type: typeless; must be Electric.

moves.name: Double Slap
moves.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.
moves.shortDesc: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.desc: Raises the user's evasiveness by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's evasiveness by 1.

moves.name: Draco Meteor
moves.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

moves.name: Dragon Ascent
moves.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

moves.name: Dragon Breath
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to paralyze the target.

moves.name: Dragon Cheer
moves.desc: Raises the target's chance for a critical hit by 1 stage, or by 2 stages if the target is Dragon type. Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user, or if the target already has this effect or the Focus Energy effect. Baton Pass can be used to transfer this effect to an ally.
moves.shortDesc: Ally: Crit ratio +1, or +2 if ally is Dragon type.

moves.name: Dragon Claw
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Dragon Dance
moves.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1.

moves.name: Dragon Darts
moves.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit. In Double Battles, this move attempts to hit the targeted Pokemon and its ally once each. If hitting one of these Pokemon would be prevented by immunity, protection, semi-invulnerability, an Ability, or accuracy, it attempts to hit the other Pokemon twice instead. If this move is redirected, it hits that target twice.
moves.shortDesc: Hits twice. Doubles: Tries to hit each foe once.

moves.name: Dragon Energy
moves.desc: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.
moves.shortDesc: Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).

moves.name: Dragon Hammer
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Dragon Pulse
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Dragon Rage
moves.shortDesc: Deals 40 HP of damage to the target.

moves.name: Dragon Rush
moves.desc: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
moves.shortDesc: 20% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Dragon Tail
moves.desc: If both the user and the target have not fainted, the target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. This effect fails if the target used Ingrain previously, has the Suction Cups Ability, or this move hit a substitute.
moves.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

moves.name: Draining Kiss
moves.desc: The user recovers 3/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
moves.shortDesc: User recovers 75% of the damage dealt.

moves.name: Drain Punch
moves.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
moves.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

moves.name: Dream Eater
moves.desc: The target is unaffected by this move unless it is asleep. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
moves.shortDesc: User gains 1/2 HP inflicted. Sleeping target only.

moves.name: Drill Peck
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Drill Run
moves.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
moves.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Drum Beating
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

moves.name: Dual Chop
moves.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.
moves.shortDesc: Hits 2 times in one turn.

moves.name: Dual Wingbeat
moves.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.
moves.shortDesc: Hits 2 times in one turn.

moves.name: Dynamax Cannon
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Dynamic Punch
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to confuse the target.

moves.name: Earth Power
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

moves.name: Earthquake
moves.desc: Damage doubles if the target is using Dig.
moves.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Double damage on Dig.

moves.name: Echoed Voice
moves.desc: For every consecutive turn that this move is used by at least one Pokemon, this move's power is multiplied by the number of turns to pass, but not more than 5.
moves.shortDesc: Power increases when used on consecutive turns.

moves.name: Eerie Impulse
moves.desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Atk by 2.

moves.name: Eerie Spell
moves.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the target loses 3 PP from its last move.
moves.shortDesc: Removes 3 PP from the target's last move.

moves.name: Egg Bomb
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Electric Terrain
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Electric Terrain. During the effect, the power of Electric-type attacks made by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.3 and grounded Pokemon cannot fall asleep; Pokemon already asleep do not wake up. Grounded Pokemon cannot become affected by Yawn or fall asleep from its effect. Camouflage transforms the user into an Electric type, Nature Power becomes Thunderbolt, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to cause paralysis. Fails if the current terrain is Electric Terrain.
moves.shortDesc: 5 turns. Grounded: +Electric power, can't sleep.

moves.name: Electrify
moves.desc: Causes the target's move to become Electric type this turn. Among effects that can change a move's type, this effect happens last. Fails if the target already moved this turn.
moves.shortDesc: Changes the target's move to Electric this turn.

moves.name: Electro Ball
moves.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's current Speed / target's current Speed), rounded down. Power is equal to 150 if the result is 4 or more, 120 if 3, 80 if 2, 60 if 1, 40 if less than 1. If the target's current Speed is 0, this move's power is 40.
moves.shortDesc: More power the faster the user is than the target.

moves.name: Electro Drift
moves.desc: Damage is multiplied by 1.3333 if this move is super effective against the target.
moves.shortDesc: Deals 1.3333x damage with supereffective hits.

moves.name: Electro Shot
moves.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Raises the user's Special Attack by 1 stage on the first turn. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, the move completes in one turn. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, the move still requires a turn to charge.
moves.shortDesc: Raises Sp. Atk by 1, hits turn 2. Rain: no charge.

moves.name: Electroweb
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

moves.name: Embargo
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the target's held item has no effect. An item's effect of causing forme changes is unaffected, but any other effects from such items are negated. During the effect, Fling and Natural Gift are prevented from being used by the target. Items thrown at the target with Fling will still activate for it. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to use items.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, the target's item has no effect.

moves.name: Ember
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn the target.

moves.name: Encore
moves.desc: For its next 3 turns, the target is forced to repeat its last move used. If the affected move runs out of PP, the effect ends. Fails if the target is already under this effect, if it has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if the move is Assist, Blazing Torque, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Encore, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Transform, or Wicked Torque.
moves.shortDesc: Target repeats its last move for its next 3 turns.

moves.name: Endeavor
moves.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to (target's current HP - user's current HP). The target is unaffected if its current HP is less than or equal to the user's current HP.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the target's HP to the user's HP.

moves.name: Endure
moves.desc: The user will survive attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn with at least 1 HP. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
moves.shortDesc: User survives attacks this turn with at least 1 HP.

moves.name: Energy Ball
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

moves.name: Entrainment
moves.desc: Causes the target's Ability to become the same as the user's. Fails if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Ice Face, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shift, Truant, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero, or the same Ability as the user, or if the user's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Embody Aspect, Flower Gift, Forecast, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Poison Puppeteer, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shell, Tera Shift, Teraform Zero, Trace, Wonder Guard, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
moves.shortDesc: The target's Ability changes to match the user's.

moves.name: Eruption
moves.desc: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.
moves.shortDesc: Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).

moves.name: Esper Wing
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage and a higher chance for a critical hit.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise user Speed by 1. High crit.

moves.name: Eternabeam
moves.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
moves.shortDesc: User cannot move next turn.

moves.name: Expanding Force
moves.desc: If the current terrain is Psychic Terrain and the user is grounded, this move hits all opposing Pokemon and has its power multiplied by 1.5.
moves.shortDesc: User on Psychic Terrain: 1.5x power, hits foes.

moves.name: Explosion
moves.desc: The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.
moves.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. The user faints.

moves.name: Extrasensory
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Extreme Evoboost
moves.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Raises user's Atk, Def, SpA, SpD, and Spe by 2.

moves.name: Extreme Speed
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: Nearly always goes first.

moves.name: Facade
moves.desc: Power doubles if the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned. The physical damage halving effect from the user's burn is ignored.
moves.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is burn/poison/paralyzed.

moves.name: Fairy Lock
moves.desc: Prevents all active Pokemon from switching next turn. A Pokemon can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. Fails if the effect is already active.
moves.shortDesc: Prevents all Pokemon from switching next turn.

moves.name: Fairy Wind
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Fake Out
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to make the target flinch. Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.
moves.shortDesc: Hits first. First turn out only. 100% flinch chance.

moves.name: Fake Tears
moves.desc: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Def by 2.

moves.name: False Surrender
moves.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

moves.name: False Swipe
moves.desc: Leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
moves.shortDesc: Always leaves the target with at least 1 HP.

moves.name: Feather Dance
moves.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Attack by 2.

moves.name: Feint
moves.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
moves.shortDesc: Nullifies Detect, Protect, and Quick/Wide Guard.

moves.name: Feint Attack
moves.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

moves.name: Fell Stinger
moves.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 3 stages if this move knocks out the target.
moves.shortDesc: Raises user's Attack by 3 if this KOes the target.

moves.name: Fickle Beam
moves.shortDesc: Has a 30% chance this move's power is doubled.

moves.name: Fiery Dance
moves.desc: Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 50% chance to raise the user's Sp. Atk by 1.

moves.name: Fiery Wrath
moves.desc: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
moves.shortDesc: 20% chance to make the foe(s) flinch.

moves.name: Fillet Away
moves.desc: Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 2 stages in exchange for the user losing 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack, Special Attack, and Speed stat stages would not change.
moves.shortDesc: +2 Attack, Sp. Atk, Speed for 1/2 user's max HP.

moves.name: Final Gambit
moves.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's current HP. If this move is successful, the user faints.
moves.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's HP. User faints.

moves.name: Fire Blast
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn the target.

moves.name: Fire Fang
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a 10% chance to make it flinch.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn. 10% chance to flinch.

moves.name: Fire Lash
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

moves.name: Fire Pledge
moves.desc: If one of the user's allies chose to use Grass Pledge or Water Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Grass Pledge, the ally uses Fire Pledge with 150 power and a sea of fire appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which causes damage to non-Fire types equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn. If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Water Pledge with 150 power and a rainbow appears on the user's side for 4 turns, which doubles secondary effect chances and stacks with the Serene Grace Ability, except effects that cause flinching can only have their chance doubled once. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Fire Gem.
moves.shortDesc: Use with Grass or Water Pledge for added effect.

moves.name: Fire Punch
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn the target.

moves.name: Fire Spin
moves.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
moves.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

moves.name: First Impression
moves.desc: Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.
moves.shortDesc: Nearly always goes first. First turn out only.

moves.name: Fishious Rend
moves.desc: Power doubles if the user moves before the target.
moves.shortDesc: Power doubles if user moves before the target.

moves.name: Fissure
moves.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
moves.shortDesc: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.

moves.name: Flail
moves.desc: The power of this move is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down.
moves.shortDesc: More power the less HP the user has left.

moves.name: Flame Burst
moves.desc: If this move is successful, the target's ally loses 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, unless it has the Magic Guard Ability.
moves.shortDesc: Damages Pokemon next to the target as well.

moves.name: Flame Charge
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1.

moves.name: Flame Wheel
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn the target.

moves.name: Flare Blitz
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
moves.shortDesc: Has 33% recoil. 10% chance to burn. Thaws user.

moves.name: Flash
moves.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1.

moves.name: Flash Cannon
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

moves.name: Flatter
moves.desc: Raises the target's Special Attack by 1 stage and confuses it.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the target's Sp. Atk by 1 and confuses it.

moves.name: Fleur Cannon
moves.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

moves.name: Fling
moves.desc: The power of this move is based on the user's held item. The held item is lost and it activates for the target if applicable. If there is no target or the target avoids this move by protecting itself, the user's held item is still lost. The user can regain a thrown item with Recycle or the Harvest Ability. Fails if the user has no held item, if the held item cannot be thrown, if the user is under the effect of Embargo or Magic Room, or if the user has the Klutz Ability.
moves.shortDesc: Flings the user's item at the target. Power varies.

moves.name: Flip Turn
moves.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button or through the effect of the Emergency Exit or Wimp Out Abilities.
moves.shortDesc: User switches out after damaging the target.

moves.name: Floaty Fall
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Floral Healing
moves.desc: The target restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the terrain is Grassy Terrain, the target instead restores 2/3 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
moves.shortDesc: Heals the target by 50% of its max HP.

moves.name: Flower Shield
moves.desc: Raises the Defense of all active Grass-type Pokemon by 1 stage. Fails if there are no active Grass-type Pokemon.
moves.shortDesc: Raises Defense by 1 of all active Grass types.

moves.name: Flower Trick
moves.desc: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities. This move does not check accuracy.
moves.shortDesc: Always results in a critical hit; no accuracy check.

moves.name: Fly
moves.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister, and Gust and Twister have doubled power when used against it. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
moves.shortDesc: Flies up on first turn, then strikes the next turn.

moves.name: Flying Press
moves.desc: This move combines Flying in its type effectiveness against the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
moves.shortDesc: Combines Flying in its type effectiveness.

moves.name: Focus Blast
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

moves.name: Focus Energy
moves.desc: Raises the user's chance for a critical hit by 2 stages. Fails if the user already has the effect. Baton Pass can be used to transfer this effect to an ally.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's critical hit ratio by 2.

moves.name: Focus Punch
moves.desc: The user loses its focus and does nothing if it is hit by a damaging attack this turn before it can execute the move.
moves.shortDesc: Fails if the user takes damage before it hits.

moves.name: Follow Me
moves.desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.
moves.shortDesc: The foes' moves target the user on the turn used.

moves.name: Force Palm
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to paralyze the target.

moves.name: Foresight
moves.desc: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Miracle Eye or Odor Sleuth.
moves.shortDesc: Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.

moves.name: Forest's Curse
moves.desc: Causes the Grass type to be added to the target, effectively making it have two or three types. Fails if the target is already a Grass type. If Trick-or-Treat adds a type to the target, it replaces the type added by this move and vice versa.
moves.shortDesc: Adds Grass to the target's type(s).

moves.name: Foul Play
moves.desc: Damage is calculated using the target's Attack stat, including stat stage changes. The user's Ability, item, and burn are used as normal.
moves.shortDesc: Uses target's Attack stat in damage calculation.

moves.name: Freeze-Dry
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. This move's type effectiveness against Water is changed to be super effective no matter what this move's type is.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to freeze. Super effective on Water.

moves.name: Freeze Shock
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
moves.shortDesc: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. 30% paralyze.

moves.name: Freezing Glare
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to freeze the target.

moves.name: Freezy Frost
moves.desc: Resets the stat stages of all active Pokemon to 0.
moves.shortDesc: Eliminates all stat changes.

moves.name: Frenzy Plant
moves.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
moves.shortDesc: User cannot move next turn.

moves.name: Frost Breath
moves.desc: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities.
moves.shortDesc: Always results in a critical hit.

moves.name: Frustration
moves.desc: Power is equal to the greater of ((255 - user's Happiness) * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.
moves.shortDesc: Max 102 power at minimum Happiness.

moves.name: Fury Attack
moves.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the user is holding Loaded Dice, this move will hit 4-5 times.
moves.shortDesc: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

moves.name: Fury Cutter
moves.desc: Power doubles with each successful hit, up to a maximum of 160 power. The power is reset if this move misses or another move is used.
moves.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit, up to 160.

moves.name: Fury Swipes
moves.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the user is holding Loaded Dice, this move will hit 4-5 times.
moves.shortDesc: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

moves.name: Fusion Bolt
moves.desc: Power doubles if the last move used by any Pokemon this turn was Fusion Flare.
moves.shortDesc: Power doubles if used after Fusion Flare this turn.

moves.name: Fusion Flare
moves.desc: Power doubles if the last move used by any Pokemon this turn was Fusion Bolt.
moves.shortDesc: Power doubles if used after Fusion Bolt this turn.

moves.name: Future Sight
moves.desc: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Doom Desire is already in effect for the target's position.
moves.shortDesc: Hits two turns after being used.

moves.name: Gastro Acid
moves.desc: Causes the target's Ability to be rendered ineffective as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain under this effect. If the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Ice Face, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shift, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero, this move fails, and receiving the effect through Baton Pass ends the effect immediately.
moves.shortDesc: Nullifies the target's Ability.

moves.name: Gear Grind
moves.desc: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.
moves.shortDesc: Hits 2 times in one turn.

moves.name: Gear Up
moves.desc: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of Pokemon on the user's side with the Plus or Minus Abilities by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises Atk, Sp. Atk of allies with Plus/Minus by 1.

moves.name: Genesis Supernova
moves.desc: If this move is successful, the terrain becomes Psychic Terrain.
moves.shortDesc: Summons Psychic Terrain.

moves.name: Geomancy
moves.desc: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 2 stages. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
moves.shortDesc: Charges, then raises SpA, SpD, Spe by 2 turn 2.

moves.name: Giga Drain
moves.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
moves.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

moves.name: Giga Impact
moves.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
moves.shortDesc: User cannot move next turn.

moves.name: Gigaton Hammer
moves.shortDesc: Cannot be selected the turn after it's used.

moves.name: Gigavolt Havoc
moves.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

moves.name: Glacial Lance
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

moves.name: Glaciate
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

moves.name: Glaive Rush
moves.desc: If this move is successful, moves targeted at the user deal double damage and do not check accuracy until the user's next turn.
moves.shortDesc: User takes sure-hit 2x damage until its next turn.

moves.name: Glare
moves.desc: Paralyzes the target.
moves.shortDesc: Paralyzes the target.

moves.name: Glitzy Glow
moves.desc: This move summons Light Screen for 5 turns upon use.
moves.shortDesc: Summons Light Screen.

moves.name: G-Max Befuddle
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side either falls asleep, becomes poisoned, or becomes paralyzed, even if they have a substitute.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: slp or psn or par.

moves.name: G-Max Cannonade
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, for 4 turns each non-Water-type Pokemon on the opposing side takes damage equal to 1/6 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.

moves.name: G-Max Centiferno
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side is prevented from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw), even if they have a substitute. Causes damage equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. They can still switch out if they are holding Shed Shell or use Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends for a target if it leaves the field, or if it uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: bound 4-5 turns.

moves.name: G-Max Chi Strike
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the user's side has their critical hit ratio raised by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Allies: Crit Ratio +1.

moves.name: G-Max Cuddle
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side becomes infatuated, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen for a target if both it and the user are the same gender, if either is genderless, or if the target is already infatuated.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: infatuated.

moves.name: G-Max Depletion
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side loses 2 PP from its last move used, even if they have a substitute.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: last move -2 PP.

moves.name: G-Max Drum Solo
moves.desc: Power is 160 regardless of the base move's Max Move power. This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
moves.shortDesc: Always 160 power. Ignores Abilities.

moves.name: G-Max Finale
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the user's side restores 1/6 of its current maximum HP, even if they have a substitute.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Allies: +1/6 max HP.

moves.name: G-Max Fire Ball
moves.desc: Power is 160 regardless of the base move's Max Move power. This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
moves.shortDesc: Always 160 power. Ignores Abilities.

moves.name: G-Max Foam Burst
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Speed of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 2 stages, even if they have a substitute.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -2 Speed.

moves.name: G-Max Gold Rush
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side becomes confused, even if they have a substitute.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: confused.

moves.name: G-Max Gravitas
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Gravity begins.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Starts Gravity.

moves.name: G-Max Hydrosnipe
moves.desc: Power is 160 regardless of the base move's Max Move power. This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
moves.shortDesc: Always 160 power. Ignores Abilities.

moves.name: G-Max Malodor
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side becomes poisoned, even if they have a substitute.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: poisoned.

moves.name: G-Max Meltdown
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Torment begins for each Pokemon on the opposing side, even if they have a substitute.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: Tormented.

moves.name: G-Max One Blow
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. This move bypasses all protection effects, including Max Guard.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Bypasses Max Guard.

moves.name: G-Max Rapid Flow
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. This move bypasses all protection effects, including Max Guard.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Bypasses Max Guard.

moves.name: G-Max Replenish
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, there is a 50% chance every Pokemon on the user's side has its Berry restored, even if they have a substitute.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. 50% restores Berries.

moves.name: G-Max Resonance
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Aurora Veil begins on the user's side.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Allies: Aurora Veil.

moves.name: G-Max Sandblast
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side is prevented from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw), even if they have a substitute. Causes damage equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. They can still switch out if they are holding Shed Shell or use Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends for a target if it leaves the field, or if it uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: bound 4-5 turns.

moves.name: G-Max Smite
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side becomes confused, even if they have a substitute.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: confused.

moves.name: G-Max Snooze
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, there is a 50% chance the effect of Yawn begins on the target, even if it has a substitute.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Target: 50% Yawn.

moves.name: G-Max Steelsurge
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, it sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Steel type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Rapid Spin or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: Steel hazard.

moves.name: G-Max Stonesurge
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, it sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Rock type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Rapid Spin or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: Stealth Rock.

moves.name: G-Max Stun Shock
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side either becomes poisoned or paralyzed, even if they have a substitute.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: psn or par.

moves.name: G-Max Sweetness
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the user's side has its status condition cured, even if they have a substitute.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Allies: status cured.

moves.name: G-Max Tartness
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the evasiveness of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -1 evasiveness.

moves.name: G-Max Terror
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side is prevented from switching out, even if they have a substitute. They can still switch out if they are holding Shed Shell or use Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: trapped.

moves.name: G-Max Vine Lash
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, for 4 turns each non-Grass-type Pokemon on the opposing side takes damage equal to 1/6 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.

moves.name: G-Max Volcalith
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, for 4 turns each non-Rock-type Pokemon on the opposing side takes damage equal to 1/6 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.

moves.name: G-Max Volt Crash
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side becomes paralyzed, even if they have a substitute.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: paralyzed.

moves.name: G-Max Wildfire
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, for 4 turns each non-Fire-type Pokemon on the opposing side takes damage equal to 1/6 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.

moves.name: G-Max Wind Rage
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effects of Electric Terrain, Grassy Terrain, Misty Terrain, and Psychic Terrain end, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, Aurora Veil, Safeguard, Mist, G-Max Steelsurge, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the target's side, and the effects of G-Max Steelsurge, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the user's side.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Ends Terrain, hazards.

moves.name: Grass Knot
moves.desc: This move's power is 20 if the target weighs less than 10 kg, 40 if less than 25 kg, 60 if less than 50 kg, 80 if less than 100 kg, 100 if less than 200 kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200 kg.
moves.shortDesc: More power the heavier the target.

moves.name: Grass Pledge
moves.desc: If one of the user's allies chose to use Fire Pledge or Water Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Fire Pledge, the ally uses Fire Pledge with 150 power and a sea of fire appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which causes damage to non-Fire types equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn. If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Grass Pledge with 150 power and a swamp appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which quarters the Speed of each Pokemon on that side. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Grass Gem.
moves.shortDesc: Use with Fire or Water Pledge for added effect.

moves.name: Grass Whistle
moves.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

moves.name: Grassy Glide
moves.desc: If the current terrain is Grassy Terrain and the user is grounded, this move has its priority increased by 1.
moves.shortDesc: User on Grassy Terrain: +1 priority.

moves.name: Grassy Terrain
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Grassy Terrain. During the effect, the power of Grass-type attacks used by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.3, the power of Bulldoze, Earthquake, and Magnitude used against grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 0.5, and grounded Pokemon have 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, restored at the end of each turn, including the last turn. Camouflage transforms the user into a Grass type, Nature Power becomes Energy Ball, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to cause sleep. Fails if the current terrain is Grassy Terrain.
moves.shortDesc: 5 turns. Grounded: +Grass power, +1/16 max HP.

moves.name: Grav Apple
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage. Power is multiplied by 1.5 during Gravity's effect.
moves.shortDesc: Target: 100% -1 Def. During Gravity: 1.5x power.

moves.name: Gravity
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the evasiveness of all active Pokemon is multiplied by 0.6. At the time of use, Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, and Telekinesis end immediately for all active Pokemon. During the effect, Bounce, Fly, Flying Press, High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, Splash, and Telekinesis are prevented from being used by all active Pokemon. Ground-type attacks, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Arena Trap Ability can affect Flying types or Pokemon with the Levitate Ability. Fails if this move is already in effect.
moves.shortDesc: 5 turns: no Ground immunities, 1.67x accuracy.

moves.name: Growl
moves.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the foe(s) Attack by 1.

moves.name: Growth
moves.desc: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If the weather is Sunny Day or Desolate Land, this move raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella, this move will only raise the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage, even if the weather is Sunny Day or Desolate Land.
moves.shortDesc: Raises user's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1; 2 in Sun.

moves.name: Grudge
moves.desc: Until the user's next turn, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that move loses all its remaining PP.
moves.shortDesc: If the user faints, the attack used loses all its PP.

moves.name: Guardian of Alola
moves.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to 3/4 of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
moves.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 3/4 target's current HP.

moves.name: Guard Split
moves.desc: The user and the target have their Defense and Special Defense stats set to be equal to the average of the user and the target's Defense and Special Defense stats, respectively, rounded down. Stat stage changes are unaffected.
moves.shortDesc: Averages Defense and Sp. Def stats with target.

moves.name: Guard Swap
moves.desc: The user swaps its Defense and Special Defense stat stage changes with the target.
moves.shortDesc: Swaps Defense and Sp. Def changes with target.

moves.name: Guillotine
moves.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
moves.shortDesc: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.

moves.name: Gunk Shot
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to poison the target.

moves.name: Gust
moves.desc: Power doubles if the target is using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop.
moves.shortDesc: Power doubles during Bounce, Fly, and Sky Drop.

moves.name: Gyro Ball
moves.desc: Power is equal to (25 * target's current Speed / user's current Speed) + 1, rounded down, but not more than 150. If the user's current Speed is 0, this move's power is 1.
moves.shortDesc: More power the slower the user than the target.

moves.name: Hail
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Hail. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are an Ice type or have the Ice Body, Magic Guard, Overcoat, or Snow Cloak Abilities. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Icy Rock. Fails if the current weather is Hail.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, hail crashes down.

moves.name: Hammer Arm
moves.desc: Lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Speed by 1.

moves.name: Happy Hour
moves.shortDesc: No competitive use.

moves.name: Harden
moves.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Defense by 1.

moves.name: Hard Press
moves.desc: Power is equal to 100 * (target's current HP / target's maximum HP), rounded half down, but not less than 1.
moves.shortDesc: More power the more HP the target has left.

moves.name: Haze
moves.desc: Resets the stat stages of all active Pokemon to 0.
moves.shortDesc: Eliminates all stat changes.

moves.name: Headbutt
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Head Charge
moves.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
moves.shortDesc: Has 1/4 recoil.

moves.name: Headlong Rush
moves.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

moves.name: Head Smash
moves.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
moves.shortDesc: Has 1/2 recoil.

moves.name: Heal Bell
moves.desc: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its non-volatile status condition. Active Pokemon with the Soundproof Ability are not cured, unless they are the user.
moves.shortDesc: Cures the user's party of all status conditions.

moves.name: Heal Block
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the target is prevented from restoring any HP as long as it remains active. During the effect, healing and draining moves are unusable, and Abilities and items that grant healing will not heal the user. If an affected Pokemon uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to restore its HP. Pain Split and the Regenerator Ability are unaffected.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, the foe(s) is prevented from healing.

moves.name: Healing Wish
moves.desc: The user faints, and if the Pokemon brought out to replace it does not have full HP or has a non-volatile status condition, its HP is fully restored along with having any non-volatile status condition cured. The replacement is sent out at the end of the turn, and the healing happens before hazards take effect. This effect continues until a Pokemon that meets either of these conditions switches in at the user's position or gets swapped into the position with Ally Switch. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.
moves.shortDesc: User faints. Next hurt Pokemon is fully healed.

moves.name: Heal Order
moves.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
moves.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

moves.name: Heal Pulse
moves.desc: The target restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the user has the Mega Launcher Ability, the target instead restores 3/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
moves.shortDesc: Heals the target by 50% of its max HP.

moves.name: Heart Stamp
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Heart Swap
moves.desc: The user swaps all its stat stage changes with the target.
moves.shortDesc: Swaps all stat changes with target.

moves.name: Heat Crash
