moves.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's weight / target's weight), rounded down. Power is equal to 120 if the result is 5 or more, 100 if 4, 80 if 3, 60 if 2, and 40 if 1 or less. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
moves.shortDesc: More power the heavier the user than the target.

moves.name: Heat Wave
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to burn the foe(s).

moves.name: Heavy Slam
moves.desc: The power of this move depends on (user's weight / target's weight), rounded down. Power is equal to 120 if the result is 5 or more, 100 if 4, 80 if 3, 60 if 2, and 40 if 1 or less. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
moves.shortDesc: More power the heavier the user than the target.

moves.name: Helping Hand
moves.desc: The power of the target's attack this turn is multiplied by 1.5 (this effect is stackable). Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user or if the ally already moved this turn, but does not fail if the ally is using a two-turn move.
moves.shortDesc: One adjacent ally's move power is 1.5x this turn.

moves.name: Hex
moves.desc: Power doubles if the target has a non-volatile status condition.
moves.shortDesc: Power doubles if the target has a status ailment.

moves.name: Hidden Power
moves.desc: This move's type depends on the user's individual values (IVs), and can be any type but Fairy and Normal.
moves.shortDesc: Varies in type based on the user's IVs.

moves.name: High Horsepower
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: High Jump Kick
moves.desc: If this attack is not successful, the user loses half of its maximum HP, rounded down, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Magic Guard Ability are unaffected by crash damage.
moves.shortDesc: User is hurt by 50% of its max HP if it misses.

moves.name: Hold Back
moves.desc: Leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
moves.shortDesc: Always leaves the target with at least 1 HP.

moves.name: Hold Hands
moves.desc: No competitive use. Fails if there is no ally adjacent to the user.
moves.shortDesc: No competitive use.

moves.name: Hone Claws
moves.desc: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by 1.

moves.name: Horn Attack
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Horn Drill
moves.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
moves.shortDesc: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.

moves.name: Horn Leech
moves.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
moves.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

moves.name: Howl
moves.desc: Raises the Attack of the user and all allies 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's and ally's Attack by 1.

moves.name: Hurricane
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop. If the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%. If this move is used against a Pokemon holding Utility Umbrella, this move's accuracy remains at 70%.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to confuse target. Can't miss in rain.

moves.name: Hydro Cannon
moves.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
moves.shortDesc: User cannot move next turn.

moves.name: Hydro Pump
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Hydro Steam
moves.desc: If the current weather is Sunny Day and the user is not holding Utility Umbrella, this move's damage is multiplied by 1.5 instead of halved for being Water type.
moves.shortDesc: During Sunny Day: 1.5x damage instead of half.

moves.name: Hydro Vortex
moves.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

moves.name: Hyper Beam
moves.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
moves.shortDesc: User cannot move next turn.

moves.name: Hyper Drill
moves.shortDesc: Bypasses protection without breaking it.

moves.name: Hyper Fang
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Hyperspace Fury
moves.desc: Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage. This move cannot be used successfully unless the user's current form, while considering Transform, is Hoopa Unbound. If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
moves.shortDesc: Hoopa-U: Lowers user's Def by 1; breaks protect.

moves.name: Hyperspace Hole
moves.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
moves.shortDesc: Breaks the target's protection for this turn.

moves.name: Hyper Voice
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

moves.name: Hypnosis
moves.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

moves.name: Ice Ball
moves.desc: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn.
moves.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.

moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to freeze the target.

moves.name: Ice Burn
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
moves.shortDesc: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. 30% burn.

moves.name: Ice Fang
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a 10% chance to make it flinch.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to freeze. 10% chance to flinch.

moves.name: Ice Hammer
moves.desc: Lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Speed by 1.

moves.name: Ice Punch
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to freeze the target.

moves.name: Ice Shard
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: Usually goes first.

moves.name: Ice Spinner
moves.desc: Ends the effects of Electric Terrain, Grassy Terrain, Misty Terrain, and Psychic Terrain.
moves.shortDesc: Ends the effects of terrain.

moves.name: Icicle Crash
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Icicle Spear
moves.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the user is holding Loaded Dice, this move will hit 4-5 times.
moves.shortDesc: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

moves.name: Icy Wind
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

moves.name: Imprison
moves.desc: The user prevents all opposing Pokemon from using any moves that the user also knows as long as the user remains active.
moves.shortDesc: No foe can use any move known by the user.

moves.name: Incinerate
moves.desc: The target loses its held item if it is a Berry or a Gem. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
moves.shortDesc: Destroys the foe(s) Berry/Gem.

moves.name: Infernal Parade
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. Power doubles if the target has a non-volatile status condition.
moves.shortDesc: 30% burn. 2x power if target is already statused.

moves.name: Inferno
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to burn the target.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to burn the target.

moves.name: Inferno Overdrive
moves.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

moves.name: Infestation
moves.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
moves.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

moves.name: Ingrain
moves.desc: The user has 1/16 of its maximum HP restored at the end of each turn, but it is prevented from switching out and other Pokemon cannot force the user to switch out. The user can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped and still receive the healing effect. During the effect, the user can be hit normally by Ground-type attacks and be affected by Spikes, Toxic Spikes, and Sticky Web, even if the user is a Flying type or has the Levitate Ability.
moves.shortDesc: Traps/grounds user; heals 1/16 max HP per turn.

moves.name: Instruct
moves.desc: The target immediately uses its last used move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, if the target is preparing to use Beak Blast, Focus Punch, or Shell Trap, or if the move is Assist, Beak Blast, Belch, Bide, Blazing Torque, Celebrate, Chatter, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Focus Punch, Hold Hands, Ice Ball, Instruct, King's Shield, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Obstruct, Outrage, Petal Dance, Rollout, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Thrash, Transform, Uproar, Wicked Torque, any two-turn move, or any recharge move.
moves.shortDesc: The target immediately uses its last used move.

moves.name: Ion Deluge
moves.desc: Causes Normal-type moves to become Electric type this turn. The effect happens after other effects that change a move's type.
moves.shortDesc: Normal moves become Electric type this turn.

moves.name: Iron Defense
moves.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Defense by 2.

moves.name: Iron Head
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Iron Tail
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

moves.name: Ivy Cudgel
moves.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. If the user is an Ogerpon, this move's type changes depending on its form. Water type for Wellspring Mask, Fire type for Hearthflame Mask, and Rock type for Cornerstone Mask.
moves.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. Type depends on user's form.

moves.name: Jaw Lock
moves.desc: Prevents the user and the target from switching out. The user and the target can still switch out if either of them is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field.
moves.shortDesc: Prevents both user and target from switching out.

moves.name: Jet Punch
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: Usually goes first.

moves.name: Judgment
moves.desc: This move's type depends on the user's held Plate.
moves.shortDesc: Type varies based on the held Plate.

moves.name: Jump Kick
moves.desc: If this attack is not successful, the user loses half of its maximum HP, rounded down, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Magic Guard Ability are unaffected by crash damage.
moves.shortDesc: User is hurt by 50% of its max HP if it misses.

moves.name: Jungle Healing
moves.desc: Each Pokemon on the user's side restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up, and has its status condition cured.
moves.shortDesc: User and allies: healed 1/4 max HP, status cured.

moves.name: Karate Chop
moves.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
moves.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Kinesis
moves.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1.

moves.name: King's Shield
moves.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon trying to make contact with the user have their Attack lowered by 1 stage. Non-damaging moves go through this protection. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
moves.shortDesc: Protects from damaging attacks. Contact: -1 Atk.

moves.name: Knock Off
moves.desc: If the target is holding an item that can be removed from it, ignoring the Sticky Hold Ability, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5. If the user has not fainted, the target loses its held item. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item or cause a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, a Silvally, a Zacian, or a Zamazenta to lose their Blue Orb, Red Orb, Griseous Orb, Plate, Drive, Memory, Rusted Sword, or Rusted Shield respectively. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
moves.shortDesc: 1.5x damage if foe holds an item. Removes item.

moves.name: Kowtow Cleave
moves.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

moves.name: Land's Wrath
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

moves.name: Laser Focus
moves.desc: Until the end of the next turn, the user's attacks will be critical hits.
moves.shortDesc: Until the end of the next turn, user's moves crit.

moves.name: Lash Out
moves.desc: Power doubles if the user had a stat stage lowered this turn.
moves.shortDesc: 2x power if the user had a stat lowered this turn.

moves.name: Last Resort
moves.desc: This move fails unless the user knows this move and at least one other move, and has used all the other moves it knows at least once each since it became active or Transformed.
moves.shortDesc: Fails unless each known move has been used.

moves.name: Last Respects
moves.desc: Power is equal to 50+(X*50), where X is the total number of times any Pokemon has fainted on the user's side, and X cannot be greater than 100.
moves.shortDesc: +50 power for each time a party member fainted.

moves.name: Lava Plume
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to burn adjacent Pokemon.

moves.name: Leafage
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Leaf Blade
moves.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
moves.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Leaf Storm
moves.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

moves.name: Leaf Tornado
moves.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

moves.name: Leech Life
moves.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
moves.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

moves.name: Leech Seed
moves.desc: The Pokemon at the user's position steals 1/8 of the target's maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn. If Big Root is held by the recipient, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue being leeched. If the target switches out or uses Mortal Spin or Rapid Spin successfully, the effect ends. Grass-type Pokemon are immune to this move on use, but not its effect.
moves.shortDesc: 1/8 of target's HP is restored to user every turn.

moves.name: Leer
moves.desc: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the foe(s) Defense by 1.

moves.name: Let's Snuggle Forever
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Lick
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to paralyze the target.

moves.name: Life Dew
moves.desc: Each Pokemon on the user's side restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
moves.shortDesc: Heals the user and its allies by 1/4 their max HP.

moves.name: Light of Ruin
moves.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
moves.shortDesc: Has 1/2 recoil.

moves.name: Light Screen
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from special attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle. Damage is not reduced further with Aurora Veil. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, special damage to allies is halved.

moves.name: Light That Burns the Sky
moves.desc: This move becomes a physical attack if the user's Attack is greater than its Special Attack, including stat stage changes. This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
moves.shortDesc: Physical if user's Atk > Sp. Atk. Ignores Abilities.

moves.name: Liquidation
moves.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

moves.name: Lock-On
moves.desc: Until the end of the next turn, the target cannot avoid the user's moves, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field. Fails if this effect is active for the user.
moves.shortDesc: User's next move will not miss the target.

moves.name: Lovely Kiss
moves.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

moves.name: Low Kick
moves.desc: This move's power is 20 if the target weighs less than 10 kg, 40 if less than 25 kg, 60 if less than 50 kg, 80 if less than 100 kg, 100 if less than 200 kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200 kg.
moves.shortDesc: More power the heavier the target.

moves.name: Low Sweep
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

moves.name: Lucky Chant
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot be struck by a critical hit. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, shields user's party from critical hits.

moves.name: Lumina Crash
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 2.

moves.name: Lunar Blessing
moves.desc: Each Pokemon on the user's side restores 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up, and has its status condition cured.
moves.shortDesc: User and allies: healed 1/4 max HP, status cured.

moves.name: Lunar Dance
moves.desc: The user faints, and if the Pokemon brought out to replace it does not have full HP or PP, or has a non-volatile status condition, its HP and PP are fully restored along with having any non-volatile status condition cured. The replacement is sent out at the end of the turn, and the healing happens before hazards take effect. This effect continues until a Pokemon that meets any of these conditions switches in at the user's position or gets swapped into the position with Ally Switch. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.
moves.shortDesc: User faints. Next hurt Pkmn is cured, max HP/PP.

moves.name: Lunge
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

moves.name: Luster Purge
moves.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

moves.name: Mach Punch
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: Usually goes first.

moves.name: Magical Leaf
moves.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

moves.name: Magical Torque
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to confuse the target.

moves.name: Magic Coat
moves.desc: Until the end of the turn, the user is unaffected by certain non-damaging moves directed at it and will instead use such moves against the original user. Moves reflected in this way are unable to be reflected again by this or the Magic Bounce Ability's effect. Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, and Toxic Spikes can only be reflected once per side, by the leftmost Pokemon under this or the Magic Bounce Ability's effect. The Lightning Rod and Storm Drain Abilities redirect their respective moves before this move takes effect.
moves.shortDesc: Bounces back certain non-damaging moves.

moves.name: Magic Powder
moves.desc: Causes the target to become a Psychic type. Fails if the target is an Arceus or a Silvally, if the target is already purely Psychic type, or if the target is Terastallized.
moves.shortDesc: Changes the target's type to Psychic.

moves.name: Magic Room
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the held items of all active Pokemon have no effect. An item's effect of causing forme changes is unaffected, but any other effects from such items are negated. During the effect, Fling and Natural Gift are prevented from being used by all active Pokemon. If this move is used during the effect, the effect ends.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, all held items have no effect.

moves.name: Magma Storm
moves.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
moves.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

moves.name: Magnet Bomb
moves.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

moves.name: Magnetic Flux
moves.desc: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of Pokemon on the user's side with the Plus or Minus Abilities by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises Def, Sp. Def of allies with Plus/Minus by 1.

moves.name: Magnet Rise
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the user is immune to Ground-type attacks and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Arena Trap Ability as long as it remains active. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will gain the effect. Ingrain, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, and Iron Ball override this move if the user is under any of their effects. Fails if the user is already under this effect or the effects of Ingrain, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, the user has immunity to Ground.

moves.name: Magnitude
moves.desc: The power of this move varies; 5% chances for 10 and 150 power, 10% chances for 30 and 110 power, 20% chances for 50 and 90 power, and 30% chance for 70 power. Damage doubles if the target is using Dig.
moves.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Power varies; 2x on Dig.

moves.name: Make It Rain
moves.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 1. Hits foe(s).

moves.name: Malicious Moonsault
moves.desc: Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
moves.shortDesc: Damage doubles if the target used Minimize.

moves.name: Malignant Chain
moves.desc: Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target.
moves.shortDesc: 50% chance to badly poison the target.

moves.name: Mat Block
moves.desc: The user and its party members are protected from damaging attacks made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field, if the user moves last this turn, or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
moves.shortDesc: Protects allies from damaging attacks. Turn 1 only.

moves.name: Matcha Gotcha
moves.desc: Has a 20% chance to burn the target. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
moves.shortDesc: 20% burn. Recovers 50% dmg dealt. Thaws foe(s).

moves.name: Max Airstream
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Speed of each Pokemon on the user's side is raised by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Speed.

moves.name: Max Darkness
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Special Defense of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Sp. Def.

moves.name: Max Flare
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Sunny Day begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Starts Sunny Day.

moves.name: Max Flutterby
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Special Attack of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Max Geyser
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Rain Dance begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Starts Rain Dance.

moves.name: Max Guard
moves.desc: The user is protected from nearly all attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, including Max and G-Max Moves. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
moves.shortDesc: Protects user from moves & Max Moves this turn.

moves.name: Max Hailstorm
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Hail begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Starts Hail.

moves.name: Max Knuckle
moves.desc: Boosts the user and its allies' Attack by 1 stage. BP scales with the base move's BP. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Attack.

moves.name: Max Lightning
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Electric Terrain begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Starts Electric Terrain.

moves.name: Max Mindstorm
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Psychic Terrain begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Starts Psychic Terrain.

moves.name: Max Ooze
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Special Attack of each Pokemon on the user's side is raised by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Max Overgrowth
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Grassy Terrain begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Starts Grassy Terrain.

moves.name: Max Phantasm
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Defense of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Defense.

moves.name: Max Quake
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Special Defense of each Pokemon on the user's side is raised by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Sp. Def.

moves.name: Max Rockfall
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Sandstorm begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Starts Sandstorm.

moves.name: Max Starfall
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Misty Terrain begins. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Starts Misty Terrain.

moves.name: Max Steelspike
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Defense of each Pokemon on the user's side is raised by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Allies: +1 Defense.

moves.name: Max Strike
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Speed of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Speed.

moves.name: Max Wyrmwind
moves.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Attack of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen if the user is not Dynamaxed. If this move is used as a base move, it deals damage with a power of 0.
moves.shortDesc: Base move affects power. Foes: -1 Attack.

moves.name: Mean Look
moves.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field.
moves.shortDesc: Prevents the target from switching out.

moves.name: Meditate
moves.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack by 1.

moves.name: Me First
moves.desc: The user uses the move the target chose for use this turn against it, if possible, with its power multiplied by 1.5. The move must be a damaging move other than Beak Blast, Belch, Blazing Torque, Combat Torque, Comeuppance, Counter, Covet, Focus Punch, Magical Torque, Me First, Metal Burst, Mirror Coat, Noxious Torque, Shell Trap, Struggle, Thief, or Wicked Torque. Fails if the target moves before the user. Ignores the target's substitute for the purpose of copying the move.
moves.shortDesc: Copies a foe at 1.5x power. User must be faster.

moves.name: Mega Drain
moves.desc: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
moves.shortDesc: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

moves.name: Megahorn
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Mega Kick
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Mega Punch
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Memento
moves.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages. The user faints unless this move misses or there is no target. Fails entirely if this move hits a substitute, but does not fail if the target's stats cannot be changed.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers target's Attack, Sp. Atk by 2. User faints.

moves.name: Menacing Moonraze Maelstrom
moves.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
moves.shortDesc: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

moves.name: Metal Burst
moves.desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical or special attack this turn equal to 1.5 times the HP lost by the user from that attack, rounded down. If the user did not lose HP from that attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical or special attack this turn.
moves.shortDesc: If hit by an attack, returns 1.5x damage.

moves.name: Metal Claw
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

moves.name: Metal Sound
moves.desc: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Def by 2.

moves.name: Meteor Assault
moves.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
moves.shortDesc: User cannot move next turn.

moves.name: Meteor Beam
moves.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Raises the user's Special Attack by 1 stage on the first turn. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
moves.shortDesc: Raises user's Sp. Atk by 1 on turn 1. Hits turn 2.

moves.name: Meteor Mash
moves.desc: Has a 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

moves.name: Metronome
moves.desc: A random move is selected for use, other than After You, Apple Acid, Armor Cannon, Assist, Astral Barrage, Aura Wheel, Baneful Bunker, Beak Blast, Behemoth Bash, Behemoth Blade, Belch, Bestow, Blazing Torque, Body Press, Branch Poke, Breaking Swipe, Celebrate, Chatter, Chilling Water, Chilly Reception, Clangorous Soul, Collision Course, Combat Torque, Comeuppance, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Crafty Shield, Decorate, Destiny Bond, Detect, Diamond Storm, Doodle, Double Iron Bash, Double Shock, Dragon Ascent, Dragon Energy, Drum Beating, Dynamax Cannon, Electro Drift, Endure, Eternabeam, False Surrender, Feint, Fiery Wrath, Fillet Away, Fleur Cannon, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Freeze Shock, Freezing Glare, Glacial Lance, Grav Apple, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, Hyper Drill, Hyperspace Fury, Hyperspace Hole, Ice Burn, Instruct, Jet Punch, Jungle Healing, King's Shield, Life Dew, Light of Ruin, Magical Torque, Make It Rain, Mat Block, Me First, Meteor Assault, Metronome, Mimic, Mind Blown, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Moongeist Beam, Nature Power, Nature's Madness, Noxious Torque, Obstruct, Order Up, Origin Pulse, Overdrive, Photon Geyser, Plasma Fists, Population Bomb, Pounce, Power Shift, Precipice Blades, Protect, Pyro Ball, Quash, Quick Guard, Rage Fist, Rage Powder, Raging Bull, Raging Fury, Relic Song, Revival Blessing, Ruination, Salt Cure, Secret Sword, Shed Tail, Shell Trap, Silk Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snap Trap, Snarl, Snatch, Snore, Snowscape, Spectral Thief, Spicy Extract, Spiky Shield, Spirit Break, Spotlight, Springtide Storm, Steam Eruption, Steel Beam, Strange Steam, Struggle, Sunsteel Strike, Surging Strikes, Switcheroo, Techno Blast, Tera Starstorm, Thief, Thousand Arrows, Thousand Waves, Thunder Cage, Thunderous Kick, Tidy Up, Trailblaze, Transform, Trick, Twin Beam, V-create, Wicked Blow, Wicked Torque, or Wide Guard.
moves.shortDesc: Picks a random move.

moves.name: Mighty Cleave
moves.shortDesc: Bypasses protection without breaking it.

moves.name: Milk Drink
moves.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
moves.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

moves.name: Mimic
moves.desc: While the user remains active, this move is replaced by the last move used by the target. The copied move has the maximum PP for that move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user has Transformed, if the user already knows the move, or if the move is Assist, Behemoth Bash, Behemoth Blade, Belch, Blazing Torque, Celebrate, Chatter, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Hold Hands, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Tera Starstorm, Transform, or Wicked Torque.
moves.shortDesc: The last move the target used replaces this one.

moves.name: Mind Blown
moves.desc: Whether or not this move is successful and even if it would cause fainting, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded up, unless the user has the Magic Guard Ability. This move is prevented from executing and the user does not lose HP if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability, or if this move is Fire type and the user is affected by Powder or the weather is Primordial Sea.
moves.shortDesc: User loses 50% max HP. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

moves.name: Mind Reader
moves.desc: Until the end of the next turn, the target cannot avoid the user's moves, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field. Fails if this effect is active for the user.
moves.shortDesc: User's next move will not miss the target.

moves.name: Minimize
moves.desc: Raises the user's evasiveness by 2 stages. Whether or not the user's evasiveness was changed, Body Slam, Dragon Rush, Flying Press, Heat Crash, Heavy Slam, Malicious Moonsault, Steamroller, Stomp, and Supercell Slam will not check accuracy and have their damage doubled if used against the user while it is active.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's evasiveness by 2.

moves.name: Miracle Eye
moves.desc: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Psychic-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Dark type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Foresight or Odor Sleuth.
moves.shortDesc: Psychic hits Dark. Evasiveness ignored.

moves.name: Mirror Coat
moves.desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a special attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's special attack this turn.
moves.shortDesc: If hit by special attack, returns double damage.

moves.name: Mirror Move
moves.desc: The user uses the last move used by the target. The copied move is used against that target, if possible. Fails if the target has not made a move, or if the last move used cannot be copied by this move.
moves.shortDesc: User uses the target's last used move against it.

moves.name: Mirror Shot
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

moves.name: Mist
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members are protected from having their stat stages lowered by other Pokemon. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, protects user's party from stat drops.

moves.name: Mist Ball
moves.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

moves.name: Misty Explosion
moves.desc: If the current terrain is Misty Terrain and the user is grounded, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5. The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.
moves.shortDesc: User faints. User on Misty Terrain: 1.5x power.

moves.name: Misty Terrain
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Misty Terrain. During the effect, the power of Dragon-type attacks used against grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 0.5 and grounded Pokemon cannot be inflicted with a non-volatile status condition nor confusion. Grounded Pokemon can become affected by Yawn but cannot fall asleep from its effect. moves.desc: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.
moves.shortDesc: The foes' moves target the user on the turn used.

moves.name: Raging Bull
moves.desc: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated. If the user's current form is a Paldean Tauros, this move's type changes to match. Fighting type for Combat Breed, Fire type for Blaze Breed, and Water type for Aqua Breed.
moves.shortDesc: Destroys screens. Type depends on user's form.

moves.name: Raging Fury
moves.desc: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
moves.shortDesc: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

moves.name: Rain Dance
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Rain Dance. The damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Damp Rock. Fails if the current weather is Rain Dance.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, heavy rain powers Water moves.

moves.name: Rapid Spin
moves.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field. Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Free user from hazards/bind/Leech Seed; +1 Spe.

moves.name: Razor Leaf
moves.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
moves.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. Hits adjacent foes.

moves.name: Razor Shell
moves.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

moves.name: Razor Wind
moves.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
moves.shortDesc: Charges, then hits foe(s) turn 2. High crit ratio.

moves.name: Recover
moves.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
moves.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

moves.name: Recycle
moves.desc: The user regains the item it last used. Fails if the user is holding an item, if the user has not held an item, if the item was a popped Air Balloon, if the item was picked up by a Pokemon with the Pickup Ability, or if the item was lost to Bug Bite, Corrosive Gas, Covet, Incinerate, Knock Off, Pluck, or Thief. Items thrown with Fling can be regained.
moves.shortDesc: Restores the item the user last used.

moves.name: Reflect
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from physical attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle. Damage is not reduced further with Aurora Veil. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, physical damage to allies is halved.

moves.name: Reflect Type
moves.desc: Causes the user's types to become the same as the current types of the target. If the target's current types include typeless and a non-added type, typeless is ignored. If the target's current types include typeless and an added type from Forest's Curse or Trick-or-Treat, typeless is copied as the Normal type instead. Fails if the user is an Arceus or a Silvally, if the user is Terastallized, or if the target's current type is typeless alone.
moves.shortDesc: User becomes the same type as the target.

moves.name: Refresh
moves.desc: The user cures its burn, poison, or paralysis. Fails if the user is not burned, poisoned, or paralyzed.
moves.shortDesc: User cures its burn, poison, or paralysis.

moves.name: Relic Song
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to cause the target to fall asleep. If this move is successful on at least one target and the user is a Meloetta, it changes to Pirouette Forme if it is currently in Aria Forme, or changes to Aria Forme if it is currently in Pirouette Forme. This forme change does not happen if the Meloetta has the Sheer Force Ability. The Pirouette Forme reverts to Aria Forme when Meloetta is not active.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to sleep foe(s). Meloetta transforms.

moves.name: Rest
moves.desc: The user falls asleep for the next two turns and restores all of its HP, curing itself of any non-volatile status condition in the process. Fails if the user has full HP, is already asleep, or if another effect is preventing sleep.
moves.shortDesc: User sleeps 2 turns and restores HP and status.

moves.name: Retaliate
moves.desc: Power doubles if one of the user's party members fainted last turn.
moves.shortDesc: Power doubles if an ally fainted last turn.

moves.name: Return
moves.desc: Power is equal to the greater of (user's Happiness * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.
moves.shortDesc: Max 102 power at maximum Happiness.

moves.name: Revelation Dance
moves.desc: This move's type depends on the user's primary type. If the user's primary type is typeless, this move's type is the user's secondary type if it has one, otherwise the added type from Forest's Curse or Trick-or-Treat. This move is typeless if the user's type is typeless alone.
moves.shortDesc: Type varies based on the user's primary type.

moves.name: Revenge
moves.desc: Power doubles if the user was hit by the target this turn.
moves.shortDesc: Power doubles if user is damaged by the target.

moves.name: Reversal
moves.desc: The power of this move is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down.
moves.shortDesc: More power the less HP the user has left.

moves.name: Revival Blessing
moves.desc: A fainted party member is selected and revived with 1/2 its max HP, rounded down. Fails if there are no fainted party members.
moves.shortDesc: Revives a fainted Pokemon to 50% HP.

moves.name: Rising Voltage
moves.desc: If the current terrain is Electric Terrain and the target is grounded, this move's power is doubled.
moves.shortDesc: 2x power if target is grounded in Electric Terrain.

moves.name: Roar
moves.desc: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, or if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Suction Cups Ability.
moves.shortDesc: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

moves.name: Roar of Time
moves.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
moves.shortDesc: User cannot move next turn.

moves.name: Rock Blast
moves.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the user is holding Loaded Dice, this move will hit 4-5 times.
moves.shortDesc: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

moves.name: Rock Climb
moves.desc: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
moves.shortDesc: 20% chance to confuse the target.

moves.name: Rock Polish
moves.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Speed by 2.

moves.name: Rock Slide
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the foe(s) flinch.

moves.name: Rock Smash
moves.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

moves.name: Rock Throw
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Rock Tomb
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

moves.name: Rock Wrecker
moves.desc: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
moves.shortDesc: User cannot move next turn.

moves.name: Role Play
moves.desc: The user's Ability changes to match the target's Ability. Fails if the user's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Ice Face, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shift, Zen Mode, Zero to Hero, or already matches the target, or if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Embody Aspect, Flower Gift, Forecast, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Poison Puppeteer, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shell, Tera Shift, Teraform Zero, Trace, Wonder Guard, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
moves.shortDesc: User replaces its Ability with the target's.

moves.name: Rolling Kick
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

moves.name: Rollout
moves.desc: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn.
moves.shortDesc: Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.

moves.name: Roost
moves.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the user is not Terastallized, until the end of the turn Flying-type users lose their Flying type and pure Flying-type users become Normal type. Does nothing if the user's HP is full.
moves.shortDesc: Heals 50% HP. Flying-type removed 'til turn ends.

moves.name: Rototiller
moves.desc: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grounded Grass-type Pokemon on the field by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises Atk/Sp. Atk of grounded Grass types by 1.

moves.name: Round
moves.desc: If there are other active Pokemon that chose this move for use this turn, those Pokemon take their turn immediately after the user, in Speed order, and this move's power is 120 for each other user.
moves.shortDesc: Power doubles if others used Round this turn.

moves.name: Ruination
moves.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
moves.shortDesc: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

moves.name: Sacred Fire
moves.desc: Has a 50% chance to burn the target.
moves.shortDesc: 50% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

moves.name: Sacred Sword
moves.desc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness.
moves.shortDesc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes.

moves.name: Safeguard
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot have non-volatile status conditions or confusion inflicted on them by other Pokemon. Pokemon on the user's side cannot become affected by Yawn but can fall asleep from its effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Defog. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, protects user's party from status.

moves.name: Salt Cure
moves.desc: Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/4 if the target is Steel or Water type), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. This effect ends when the target is no longer active.
moves.shortDesc: Deals 1/8 max HP each turn; 1/4 on Steel, Water.

moves.name: Sand Attack
moves.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1.

moves.name: Sandsear Storm
moves.desc: Has a 20% chance to burn the target. If the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If this move is used against a Pokemon holding Utility Umbrella, this move's accuracy remains at 80%.
moves.shortDesc: 20% chance to burn foe(s). Can't miss in rain.

moves.name: Sandstorm
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sandstorm. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are a Ground, Rock, or Steel type, or have the Magic Guard, Overcoat, Sand Force, Sand Rush, or Sand Veil Abilities. During the effect, the Special Defense of Rock-type Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 when taking damage from a special attack. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Smooth Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sandstorm.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, a sandstorm rages. Rock: 1.5x SpD.

moves.name: Sand Tomb
moves.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
moves.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

moves.name: Sappy Seed
moves.desc: This move summons Leech Seed on the foe.
moves.shortDesc: Summons Leech Seed.

moves.name: Savage Spin-Out
moves.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

moves.name: Scald
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.

moves.name: Scale Shot
moves.desc: Hits two to five times. Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage and raises the user's Speed by 1 stage after the last hit. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the user is holding Loaded Dice, this move will hit 4-5 times.
moves.shortDesc: Hits 2-5 times. User: -1 Def, +1 Spe after last hit.

moves.name: Scary Face
moves.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2.

moves.name: Scorching Sands
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.

moves.name: Scratch
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Screech
moves.desc: Lowers the target's Defense by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Defense by 2.

moves.name: Searing Shot
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to burn adjacent Pokemon.

moves.name: Searing Sunraze Smash
moves.desc: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
moves.shortDesc: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

moves.name: Secret Power
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to cause a secondary effect on the target based on the battle terrain. Causes paralysis on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, causes paralysis during Electric Terrain, lowers Special Attack by 1 stage during Misty Terrain, causes sleep during Grassy Terrain and lowers Speed by 1 stage during Psychic Terrain.
moves.shortDesc: Effect varies with terrain. (30% paralysis chance)

moves.name: Secret Sword
moves.desc: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.
moves.shortDesc: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

moves.name: Seed Bomb
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Seed Flare
moves.desc: Has a 40% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: 40% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 2.

moves.name: Seismic Toss
moves.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.
moves.shortDesc: Does damage equal to the user's level.

moves.name: Self-Destruct
moves.desc: The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.
moves.shortDesc: Hits adjacent Pokemon. The user faints.

moves.name: Shadow Ball
moves.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

moves.name: Shadow Bone
moves.desc: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

moves.name: Shadow Claw
moves.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
moves.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Shadow Force
moves.desc: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
moves.shortDesc: Disappears turn 1. Hits turn 2. Breaks protection.

moves.name: Shadow Punch
moves.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

moves.name: Shadow Sneak
moves.desc: No additional effect.
moves.shortDesc: Usually goes first.

moves.name: Shadow Strike
moves.desc: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

moves.name: Sharpen
moves.desc: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Attack by 1.

moves.name: Shattered Psyche
moves.shortDesc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

moves.name: Shed Tail
moves.desc: The user takes 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded up, and creates a substitute that has 1/4 of the user's maximum HP, rounded down. The user is replaced with another Pokemon in its party and the selected Pokemon has the substitute transferred to it. Fails if the user would faint, or if there are no unfainted party members.
moves.shortDesc: User takes 1/2 its max HP to pass a substitute.

moves.name: Sheer Cold
moves.desc: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + X)%, where X is 30 if the user is an Ice type and 20 otherwise, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Ice-type Pokemon and Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
moves.shortDesc: OHKOs non-Ice targets. Fails if user's lower level.

moves.name: Shell Side Arm
moves.desc: Has a 20% chance to poison the target. This move becomes a physical attack that makes contact if the value of ((((2 * the user's level / 5 + 2) * 90 * X) / Y) / 50), where X is the user's Attack stat and Y is the target's Defense stat, is greater than the same value where X is the user's Special Attack stat and Y is the target's Special Defense stat. No stat modifiers other than stat stage changes are considered for this purpose. If the two values are equal, this move chooses a damage category at random.
moves.shortDesc: 20% psn. Physical+contact if it would be stronger.

moves.name: Shell Smash
moves.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers Def, SpD by 1; raises Atk, SpA, Spe by 2.

moves.name: Shell Trap
moves.desc: Fails unless the user is hit by a physical attack from an opponent this turn before it can execute the move. If the user was hit and has not fainted, it attacks immediately after being hit, and the effect ends. If the opponent's physical attack had a secondary effect removed by the Sheer Force Ability, it does not count for the purposes of this effect.
moves.shortDesc: User must take physical damage before moving.

moves.name: Shelter
moves.desc: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Defense by 2.

moves.name: Shift Gear
moves.desc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages and its Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's Speed by 2 and Attack by 1.

moves.name: Shock Wave
moves.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

moves.name: Shore Up
moves.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half down. If the weather is Sandstorm, the user instead restores 2/3 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
moves.shortDesc: User restores 1/2 its max HP; 2/3 in Sandstorm.

moves.name: Signal Beam
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to confuse the target.

moves.name: Silk Trap
moves.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon trying to make contact with the user have their Speed lowered by 1 stage. Non-damaging moves go through this protection. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
moves.shortDesc: Protects from damaging attacks. Contact: -1 Spe.

moves.name: Silver Wind
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).

moves.name: Simple Beam
moves.desc: Causes the target's Ability to become Simple. Fails if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Ice Face, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Simple, Stance Change, Tera Shift, Truant, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
moves.shortDesc: The target's Ability becomes Simple.

moves.name: Sing
moves.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

moves.name: Sinister Arrow Raid
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Sizzly Slide
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to burn the foe.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to burn the foe.

moves.name: Sketch
moves.desc: This move is permanently replaced by the last move used by the target. The copied move has the maximum PP for that move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user has Transformed, or if the move is Blazing Torque, Combat Torque, Dark Void, Hyperspace Fury, Magical Torque, Noxious Torque, Revival Blessing, Sketch, Struggle, Tera Starstorm, Wicked Torque, or any move the user knows.
moves.shortDesc: Permanently copies the last move target used.

moves.name: Skill Swap
moves.desc: The user swaps its Ability with the target's Ability. Fails if either the user or the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Embody Aspect, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Poison Puppeteer, Power Construct, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shell, Tera Shift, Teraform Zero, Wonder Guard, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
moves.shortDesc: The user and the target trade Abilities.

moves.name: Skitter Smack
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower target's Sp. Atk by 1.

moves.name: Skull Bash
moves.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage on the first turn. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
moves.shortDesc: Raises user's Defense by 1 on turn 1. Hits turn 2.

moves.name: Sky Attack
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch and a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
moves.shortDesc: Charges, then hits turn 2. 30% flinch. High crit.

moves.name: Sky Drop
moves.desc: This attack takes the target into the air with the user on the first turn and executes on the second. Pokemon weighing 200 kg or more cannot be lifted. On the first turn, the user and the target avoid all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister. The user and the target cannot make a move between turns, but the target can select a move to use. This move cannot damage Flying-type Pokemon. Fails on the first turn if the target is an ally, if the target has a substitute, or if the target is using Bounce, Dig, Dive, Fly, Phantom Force, Shadow Force, or Sky Drop.
moves.shortDesc: User and foe fly up turn 1. Damages on turn 2.

moves.name: Sky Uppercut
moves.desc: This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop.
moves.shortDesc: Can hit Pokemon using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop.

moves.name: Slack Off
moves.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
moves.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

moves.name: Slam
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Slash
moves.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
moves.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Sleep Powder
moves.shortDesc: Causes the target to fall asleep.

moves.name: Sleep Talk
moves.desc: One of the user's known moves, besides this move, is selected for use at random. Fails if the user is not asleep. The selected move does not have PP deducted from it, and can currently have 0 PP. This move cannot select Assist, Beak Blast, Belch, Bide, Blazing Torque, Celebrate, Chatter, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Focus Punch, Hold Hands, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Uproar, Wicked Torque, or any two-turn move.
moves.shortDesc: User must be asleep. Uses another known move.

moves.name: Sludge
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to poison the target.

moves.name: Sludge Bomb
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to poison the target.

moves.name: Sludge Wave
moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to poison the target.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to poison adjacent Pokemon.

moves.name: Smack Down
moves.desc: This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop. If this move hits a target under the effect of Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, or Telekinesis, the effect ends. If the target is a Flying type that has not used Roost this turn or a Pokemon with the Levitate Ability, it loses its immunity to Ground-type attacks and the Arena Trap Ability as long as it remains active. During the effect, Magnet Rise fails for the target and Telekinesis fails against the target.
moves.shortDesc: Removes the target's Ground immunity.

moves.name: Smart Strike
moves.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy.

moves.name: Smelling Salts
moves.desc: Power doubles if the target is paralyzed. If the user has not fainted, the target is cured of paralysis.
moves.shortDesc: Power doubles if target is paralyzed, and cures it.

moves.name: Smog
moves.desc: Has a 40% chance to poison the target.
moves.shortDesc: 40% chance to poison the target.

moves.name: Smokescreen
moves.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1.

moves.name: Snap Trap
moves.desc: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
moves.shortDesc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

moves.name: Snarl
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Sp. Atk by 1.

moves.name: Snatch
moves.desc: If another Pokemon uses certain non-damaging moves this turn, the user steals that move to use itself. If multiple Pokemon use one of those moves this turn, the applicable moves are all stolen by the first Pokemon in turn order that used this move this turn. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.
moves.shortDesc: User steals certain support moves to use itself.

moves.name: Snipe Shot
moves.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. This move cannot be redirected to a different target by any effect.
moves.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio. Cannot be redirected.

moves.name: Snore
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Fails if the user is not asleep.
moves.shortDesc: User must be asleep. 30% chance to flinch target.

moves.name: Snowscape
moves.desc: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Snow. During the effect, the Defense of Ice-type Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 when taking damage from a physical attack. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Icy Rock. Fails if the current weather is Snow.
moves.shortDesc: For 5 turns, snow falls. Ice: 1.5x Def.

moves.name: Soak
moves.desc: Causes the target to become a Water type. Fails if the target is an Arceus or a Silvally, if the target is already purely Water type, or if the target is Terastallized.
moves.shortDesc: Changes the target's type to Water.

moves.name: Soft-Boiled
moves.desc: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
moves.shortDesc: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

moves.name: Solar Beam
moves.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, Sandstorm, or Snow and the user is not holding Utility Umbrella. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move still requires a turn to charge.
moves.shortDesc: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. No charge in sunlight.

moves.name: Solar Blade
moves.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm and the user is not holding Utility Umbrella. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move still requires a turn to charge.
moves.shortDesc: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. No charge in sunlight.

moves.name: Sonic Boom
moves.desc: Deals 20 HP of damage to the target.
moves.shortDesc: Always does 20 HP of damage.

moves.name: Soul-Stealing 7-Star Strike
moves.shortDesc: No additional effect.

moves.name: Spacial Rend
moves.desc: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
moves.shortDesc: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Spark
moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to paralyze the target.

moves.name: Sparkling Aria
moves.desc: If the user has not fainted, the target is cured of its burn.
moves.shortDesc: The target is cured of its burn.

moves.name: Sparkly Swirl
moves.desc: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its non-volatile status condition.
moves.shortDesc: Cures the user's party of all status conditions.

moves.name: Spectral Thief
moves.desc: The target's stat stages greater than 0 are stolen from it and applied to the user before dealing damage.
moves.shortDesc: Steals target's boosts before dealing damage.

moves.name: Speed Swap
moves.desc: The user swaps its Speed stat with the target. Stat stage changes are unaffected.
moves.shortDesc: Swaps Speed stat with target.

moves.name: Spicy Extract
moves.desc: Raises the target's Attack by 2 stages and lowers its Defense by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Raises target's Atk by 2 and lowers its Def by 2.

moves.name: Spider Web
moves.desc: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field.
moves.shortDesc: Prevents the target from switching out.

moves.name: Spike Cannon
moves.desc: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.
moves.shortDesc: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

moves.name: Spikes
moves.desc: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Can be used up to three times before failing. Opponents lose 1/8 of their maximum HP with one layer, 1/6 of their maximum HP with two layers, and 1/4 of their maximum HP with three layers, all rounded down. Can be removed from the opposing side if any Pokemon uses Tidy Up, or if any opposing Pokemon uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
moves.shortDesc: Hurts grounded foes on switch-in. Max 3 layers.

moves.name: Spiky Shield
moves.desc: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon making contact with the user lose 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
moves.shortDesc: Protects from moves. Contact: loses 1/8 max HP.

moves.name: Spin Out
moves.desc: Lowers the user's Speed by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the user's Speed by 2.

moves.name: Spirit Break
moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the target's Sp. Atk by 1.

moves.name: Spirit Shackle
